options.description: The `processing-station-group.json` file generated by the `css-to-coi` converter.

The processing directory into which to build the configuration files and folders. For example /home/user/custom-config/processing. You will be able to provide the custom-config directory to the gmskube install or gmskube reconfig script to pick up the configuration.
The base URL of the configuration service. For example: `https://deployment-name.example.com`
The `supported-monitor-types.json` file, which is part of the SOH Configuration Tool.
